I was about to post a similar article <a href="http://www.news.va/en/news/nigerian-archbishop-his-fury-and-suspicions-about" rel="nofollow" data-ref-id="false">similar article </a> in one of my threads (the thread about the 7 Egyptian workers killed in Benghazi). According to the article I just linked the local Archbishop believes that Boko Haram may have sympathizers/informants inside the Nigerian security forces. Also the article starts out: "Residents of a town in North East Nigeria claim security forces withdrew from 2 local checkpoints shortly before an attack by Islamic militants on a boarding school.". That makes things even more troubling?
